## [Check if a website is down.](http://isitdownorisit.me/)

**Check against [PageSpeed Insights live](https://developers.google.com/speed/pagespeed/insights/?url=http://isitdownorisit.me/)**

**Score**: [66](https://developers.google.com/speed/pagespeed/insights/?url=http://isitdownorisit.me/)

### Performance issues


### Performance issues

*  Eliminate render-blocking JavaScript and CSS in above-the-fold content
*  Enable compression

### Mobile UX issues

*  Size tap targets appropriately
*  Use legible font sizes
